name: Set Party Name
Set Party Name in Bulk Payment Entry Details
Set
Stock Reorder Pop Up
script:
mr_doc = frappe.new_doc("Material Request")

# Initialize a list to hold items that meet the condition
items_to_append = []

for i in doc.get("items"):
    if i.item_code and i.warehouse and i.actual_qty:
        minimum_qty = frappe.db.get_all('Item Reorder', filters={'parent': i.item_code, 'warehouse': i.warehouse}, fields=['warehouse_reorder_level', 'warehouse_reorder_qty'])
        if minimum_qty and minimum_qty[0]['warehouse_reorder_level'] == i.actual_qty:
            frappe.msgprint("Material Request Generated ! You Reached Your Reordered Level Value for Item: " + str(i.item_code) + " - " + str(i.item_name), indicator='orange', title='Warning')
            items_to_append.append({
                "item_code": i.item_code,
                "schedule_date": doc.posting_date,
                "qty": minimum_qty[0]['warehouse_reorder_qty'],
                "warehouse": i.warehouse,
            })

# Append items to the Material Request document
for item in items_to_append:
    mr_doc.append("items", item)

# If there are items to be appended
if items_to_append:
    mr_doc.insert()
    mr_doc.save()

    # After saving the Material Request, notify the user
    matreqdoc = frappe.db.get_all("Material Request", fields=["name"], order_by="creation DESC", limit=1)
    matreqdoc_doc = matreqdoc[0].name
    
    users = frappe.get_all("User", filters={"email": ["in", ["purvi.ved@erpdata.in","sonali.kinikar@eprdata.in","tejal.kumbhar@erpdata.in", "deepak@bastardairyfarm.com", "imrangd@bastardairyfarm.com", "shivam@bastardairyfarm.com", "gulzar@bastardairyfarm.com", "purchase@bastardairyfarm.com", "imran@bastardairyfarm.com"]]}, fields=["name"])
    # frappe.throw(str(users))
    for user in users:
        # frappe.throw(str(user))
        notification_log = frappe.new_doc('Notification Log')
        notification_log.subject = 'Required Material Request done'
        notification_log.message = 'Material Request created'
        notification_log.status = 'Open'
        notification_log.document_type = 'Material Request'
        notification_log.document_name = matreqdoc_doc
        notification_log.for_user = user.name
        notification_log.insert(ignore_permissions=True)

name: Reorder Notification Pop Up
script:
mr_doc = frappe.new_doc("Material Request")

# Initialize a list to hold items that meet the condition
items_to_append = []

for i in doc.get("items"):
  
    if i.item_code and i.s_warehouse and i.actual_qty:
        
        minimum_qty = frappe.db.get_all('Item Reorder', filters={'parent': i.item_code, 'warehouse': i.s_warehouse}, fields=['warehouse_reorder_level', 'warehouse_reorder_qty'])
        
        if minimum_qty and minimum_qty[0]['warehouse_reorder_level'] == i.actual_qty:
            frappe.msgprint("Material Request Generated ! You Reached Your Reordered Level Value for Item: " + str(i.item_code) + " - " + str(i.item_name), indicator='orange', title='Warning')
            items_to_append.append({
                "item_code": i.item_code,
                "schedule_date": doc.posting_date,
                "qty": minimum_qty[0]['warehouse_reorder_qty'],
                "warehouse": i.s_warehouse,
            })

# Append items to the Material Request document
for item in items_to_append:
    mr_doc.append("items", item)

# If there are items to be appended
if items_to_append:
    mr_doc.insert()
    mr_doc.save()

    # After saving the Material Request, notify the user
    matreqdoc = frappe.db.get_all("Material Request", fields=["name"], order_by="creation DESC", limit=1)
    matreqdoc_doc = matreqdoc[0].name
    
    users = frappe.get_all("User", filters={"email": ["in", ["sonali.kinikar@eprdata.in","tejal.kumbhar@erpdata.in", "deepak@bastardairyfarm.com", "imrangd@bastardairyfarm.com", "shivam@bastardairyfarm.com", "gulzar@bastardairyfarm.com", "purchase@bastardairyfarm.com", "imran@bastardairyfarm.com"]]}, fields=["name"])

    for user in users:
        notification_log = frappe.new_doc('Notification Log')
        notification_log.subject = 'Required Material Request done'
        notification_log.message = 'Material Request created'
        notification_log.status = 'Open'
        notification_log.document_type = 'Material Request'
        notification_log.document_name = matreqdoc_doc
        notification_log.for_user = user.name
        notification_log.insert(ignore_permissions=True)
